item.title: 星展集团收购联盟银行股份的计划被指陷入僵局
item.description: 据知情人士透露，星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）收购马来西亚联合银行有限公司（Alliance Bank Malaysia Bhd.【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd.’s plan to buy a stake in Alliance Bank Malaysia Bhd. has stalled as Singapore’s biggest bank has yet to get regulatory approval to commence talks, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 日本公司全球债券发行接近 1,000 亿美元里程碑全球债券发行接近 1,000 亿美元里程碑
item.description: 随着日本公司周二在一级债务市场上大举发行债券，日本发行商的美元和欧元债券发行量即将突破 1,000 亿美元，这是日本有史以来首次在一年中突破 1,000 亿美元。【原文：Japanese issuers are on the verge of topping $100 billion in bond issuance across dollars and euros for the first time ever in any year, as companies from the nation stormed the primary debt market on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉自印度发布以来获得约 600 份订单，引发全球增长疑虑
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Tesla Inc.’s long-awaited entry into India has delivered underwhelming results so far, with tepid bookings fueling fresh doubts about the company’s global growth outlook.】

item.title: 实验室培育的宝石正在夺走博茨瓦纳的钻石财富
item.description:
更廉价的实验室制造宝石的崛起正在剥夺该国的收入，而正是这些收入使该国人民成为撒哈拉以南非洲大陆最富有的人 

。【原文：

The rise of cheaper, lab-made gems is robbing the country of the revenue that’s made its people the richest on the sub-Saharan African mainland 

】

item.title: 父亲退职时面临更严重的工资削减
item.description: 经济学家们曾经希望，灵活工作的时代将带来更加平衡的家庭动态— 以及父亲承担更多的照顾责任。但这并没有实现。【原文：Economists once hoped that an era of flexible working would lead to more balanced household dynamics — and dads taking on more caring duties. That hasn’t happened.】

item.title: 日本将在免税进口总限额内购买美国大米
item.description: 据东京最高贸易谈判代表称，日本将在其现有免税进口总上限的范围内处理美国提出的购买更多美国大米的要求，并且没有降低农产品关税的计划。【原文：Japan will handle US demands to buy more American rice within the confines of its existing overall cap on duty-free imports and has no plans to lower its tariffs on farm products, according to Tokyo’s top trade negotiator.】

item.title: 日本 10 年期债券在 2023 年以来最强劲拍卖后上涨
item.description: 日本的 10 年期国债拍卖出现了自 2023 年 10 月以来最强劲的需求，投资者被较高的收益率水平所吸引，从而有所缓解。【原文：Japan’s 10-year government bond auction saw its strongest demand since October 2023, bringing some relief as investors were attracted to elevated yield levels.】

item.title: 简街事件后印度再次收紧股票期权规则
item.description: 印度证券监管机构正在对股票指数期权交易实施进一步限制，以遏制投机行为，而在此之前几个月，印度证券监管机构刚刚对涉嫌操纵股票指数的简街集团（Jane Street Group）进行了打击。【原文：India’s securities regulator is imposing further restrictions on equity-index options trading in a bid to curb speculation, just months after its crackdown on Jane Street Group for alleged manipulation.】

item.title: CVC支持的FineToday第二次尝试首次公开募股
item.description: 日本个人护理用品生产商 FineToday Holdings Co. 公司去年取消了之前的上市尝试，现在已开始就可能的全球股票出售征求机构投资者的意见。【原文：FineToday Holdings Co. has started sounding out institutional investor demand for a possible global share sale after the Japanese personal-care goods maker canceled a previous attempt to go public last year.】

item.title: Metaplanet 持有者批准购买比特币的新融资工具
item.description: 日本比特币国库 Metaplanet 公司的一项提案获得了股东的批准，该提案使其能够通过优先股融资多达 5,550 亿日元（合 38 亿美元），从而在股价暴跌后扩大其融资选择。【原文：Japanese Bitcoin treasury Metaplanet Inc. secured shareholder approval for a proposal enabling it to raise as much as ¥555 billion ($3.8 billion) via preferred shares, in a bid to expand its financing options after its stock slumped.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称中国抑制价格战，信实集团将从中获益
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）认为，印度信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）将从中国抑制各行各业产能过剩的举措以及该企业集团自身精简业务的努力中获益最多。【原文：India’s Reliance Industries Ltd. stands to benefit the most from China’s push to curb overcapacity from a gamut of industries, and the conglomerate’s own efforts to streamline its businesses, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油对印度来说更便宜了，因为美国加强了对贸易的批评
item.description: 俄罗斯原油对印度买家来说越来越便宜，因为新德里面临着美国要求其削减与莫斯科石油贸易的持续压力，特朗普政府称莫斯科正在帮助资助乌克兰战争。【原文：Russian crude is getting even cheaper for India buyers as New Delhi faces sustained US pressure to cut its oil trade with Moscow, which the Trump administration says is helping fund the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 菲律宾称高达 70% 的防洪预算因腐败而流失
item.description: 据财政部长拉尔夫-雷克托（Ralph Recto）称，菲律宾用于防洪项目的政府资金有高达 70% 因腐败而流失，过去两年的经济损失高达 20 亿美元。【原文：The Philippines loses up to 70% of government funds meant for flood control projects to corruption, with economic losses reaching as much as $2 billion for the past two years, according to Finance Secretary Ralph Recto.】

item.title: 随着与中国关系的加强，印度电子制造商焕发出勃勃生机
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 日本央行副行长避免暗示加息时机
item.description: 日本央行副行长绯野良造重申了该行的一贯政策，即在条件允许的情况下上调基准利率，但未就何时可能上调基准利率作出任何暗示，从而导致日元走低。【原文：Bank of Japan Deputy Governor Ryozo Himino reiterated the bank’s standing policy on raising the benchmark rate if conditions allow while steering clear of making any hints as to when that might happen, sending the yen lower.】

item.title: 供应稀缺，亚洲长端美元债券跑赢短端同行
item.description: 亚洲发行商的长期美元票据连续第三个月跑赢短期债券，原因是投资者急于锁定较高的收益率，而这一期限的票据供应有限。【原文：Long-dated dollar notes from Asian issuers outperformed shorter debt for a third straight month, as investors rush to lock in elevated yields amid limited supply of the tenor.】

item.title: 股市涨势延续，中国保证金交易飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 中国投资者正借入创纪录的大量现金购买本地股票，进一步推动了由流动性驱动的涨势，而这一涨势几乎没有停滞的迹象。【原文：Chinese investors are borrowing a record amount of cash to buy local stocks, further fueling a liquidity-driven rally that shows few signs of stalling.】

item.title: 抹茶热潮带来绿茶制造商伊藤园 2023 年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 伊藤园株式会社第一季度利润实现两位数增长，主要得益于海外袋泡茶销售的大幅增长。【原文：Ito En Ltd. shares surged after the company posted double-digit profit growth in the first quarter, driven by a jump in overseas green tea bag sales.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴支持的机器人公司快创据称将申请在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国自动驾驶叉车和其他仓库机器人制造商快创机器人公司（Quicktron Robotics）已秘密申请在香港首次公开募股，最早可能在明年募集至少 1 亿美元资金。【原文：Quicktron Robotics, a Chinese maker of self-driving forklifts and other robots used in warehouses, has confidentially filed for a Hong Kong initial public offering that could raise at least $100 million as early as next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 黄金突破 3,500 美元，因降息押注而创下历史新高
item.description: 黄金创下历史新高，因为美联储降息的前景和人们对央行未来的担忧与日俱增，为贵金属多年来的涨势注入了新的动力。【原文：Gold hit a record high as the prospect of Federal Reserve rate cuts and growing concerns over the central bank’s future gave fresh legs to the multiyear rally in precious metals.】

item.title: 中国空调制造商在港上市首日下跌
item.description: 中国空调生产商奥克斯电器有限公司在香港首次公开募股融资 41.5 亿港元（5.32 亿美元）后，首次在港上市即告下跌。【原文：Aux Electric Co., a Chinese air conditioner maker, fell in its Hong Kong trading debut after an initial public offering that raised HK$4.15 billion ($532 million).】

item.title: 加密货币的美国势头与特朗普关系在香港活动中抢尽风头
item.description: 上周，比特币的忠实拥趸们齐聚香港，但所有的目光和精力都投向了西方，投向了美国，这个加密货币一度不太可能的指挥中心。【原文：The Bitcoin faithful gathered in Hong Kong last week, but all eyes and energy tilted west — toward the United States, now crypto’s once-unlikely command center.】

item.title: 清盘人在香港法院起诉恒大创始人许家印
item.description: 中国恒大的清算人将于周二在香港举行的法庭听证会上锁定公司创始人许家印，他们将在听证会上继续努力追回与世界上最大的企业崩溃之一有关的资金。【原文：China Evergrande’s liquidators are set to zero in on company founder Hui Ka Yan during a court hearing in Hong Kong on Tuesday, where they will push ahead with efforts to recover funds related to one of the world’s biggest corporate meltdowns.】

item.title: 印度资金管理公司 EAAA 为私人信贷融资 5.1 亿美元
item.description: EAAA India Alternatives Ltd. 为其首个私人信贷基金筹集了 450 亿卢比（约合 5.1 亿美元），该基金专注于特殊情况，如企业扭亏为盈，资金全部来自国内投资者。【原文：EAAA India Alternatives Ltd. raised 45 billion rupees ($510 million) for its first private credit fund that focuses on special situations such as business turnaround cases using money collected entirely from domestic investors.】

item.title: 贵金属需求激增，黄金接近创纪录水平
item.description: 由于美联储降息的前景以及人们对央行未来的日益担忧，贵金属多年来的涨势又有了新的动力。【原文：Gold held just below a record high and silver traded above $40 an ounce, as the prospect of Federal Reserve rate cuts and growing concerns over the central bank’s future gave fresh legs to the multi-year rally in precious metals.】

item.title: 击败 95% 同行的亚洲基金看好芯片齿轮制造商
item.description: 与美国同行相比，中国芯片制造商的股价处于四年来的高位，但一位顶级基金经理仍然认为，这些设备供应商中仍有机会。【原文：Chinese chipmakers are trading at a four-year high versus their US peers, but a top fund manager still sees pockets of opportunity among their equipment suppliers.】

item.title: 交易商等待欧佩克+会议和美国对俄罗斯的下一步行动，石油价格下跌
item.description: 由于交易商们在等待新的催化剂来推动油价走出一直以来相对狭窄的区间，因此油价一路走低，市场关注的焦点是即将召开的欧佩克+会议和美国对俄罗斯供应采取的行动。【原文：Oil drifted as traders waited for fresh catalysts to move prices out of what’s been a relatively narrow band, with attention on an upcoming OPEC+ meeting and US moves on Russian supplies.】

item.title: 西太平洋银行将招聘数百名银行家推动商业贷款业务
item.description: 西太平洋银行（Westpac Banking Corp.【原文：Westpac Banking Corp. plans to hire 350 bankers and turn more to artificial intelligence as it ramps up business lending.】

item.title: 台湾寿险公司货币对冲成本大幅下降
item.description: 台币近期的疲软以及由此导致的套利交易回潮正在迅速降低本地寿险公司的对冲成本。【原文：The Taiwan dollar’s recent weakness and the resulting return of carry trades are quickly driving down local life insurers’ hedging costs.】

item.title: 韩国通胀缓解，为韩国央行恢复减息提供更多空间
item.description: 韩国的消费通胀率降温到了今年以来最慢的速度，这为央行在 10 月份的下一次政策会议上恢复货币宽松周期提供了更大的空间。【原文：South Korea’s consumer inflation cooled to the slowest pace this year, giving the central bank more room to resume its monetary easing cycle at its next policy meeting in October.】
